definitions.definition: Any gathered or curled strip of fabric added as trim or decoration .
examples: She loved the dress with the lace ruffle at the hem.
to put the mind in a ruffle

definitions.definition: A low, vibrating beat of a drum , quieter than a roll ; a ruff .
The connected series of large egg capsules , or oothecae , of several species of American marine gastropods of the genus Fulgur .

main_definition: Any gathered or curled strip of fabric added as trim or decoration .
secondary_definitions: ( military ) A low, vibrating beat of a drum , quieter than a roll ; a ruff .
( zoology ) The connected series of large egg capsules , or oothecae , of several species of American marine gastropods of the genus Fulgur .
